trans-unit.source: The abstract base class that defines methods for serializing and deserializing versions of WS-Trust response (RSTR) messages.
trans-unit.target: 직렬화 및 역직렬화 WS-트러스트 (RSTR) 응답 메시지의 버전에 대 한 메서드를 정의 하는 추상 기본 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustResponseSerializer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, checks if the specified XML reader is positioned at a WS-Trust RequestSecurityTokenResponse element.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 WS-트러스트 RequestSecurityTokenResponse 요소에 지정 된 XML 판독기가 배치 하는 경우를 확인 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object from which to read.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>을 읽을 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader is positioned at an RSTR element that this serializer can read; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>이 직렬 변환기이가 읽을 수 있는 RSTR 요소에 판독기가 배치 하는 경우 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> class that this class can serialize or deserialize.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스를 만듭니다는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> 수이 클래스를 serialize 하거나 deserialize 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, deserializes the RSTR from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object to a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 역직렬화에서 RSTR는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>개체는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The XML reader over the RSTR.
trans-unit.target: RSTR 통해 XML 판독기입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> 현재 serialization 컨텍스트를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object if the deserialization was successful.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> deserialization 성공적으로 수행 하는 경우 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in the derived class reads a child element inside the RSTR.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 된 경우 RSTR 내 자식 요소를 읽습니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned at an element to read inside the RSTR.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>RSTR 내부 읽을 요소에 배치 하는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> element that is being populated from the reader.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> 판독기에서 채워지고 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> 현재 serialization 컨텍스트를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Validates the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object that has been deserialized.
trans-unit.target: 유효성을 검사는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> deserialize 된 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"></xref> object to validate.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityToken"> </xref> 유효성을 검사할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: requestSecurityTokenResponse is .
trans-unit.target: requestSecurityTokenResponseis .

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the supported elements on the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object to the outgoing stream.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면에서 지원 되는 요소를 쓰는 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> 나가는 스트림에 대 한 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> serialize 할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to write to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>에 쓰려고 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> 현재 serialization 컨텍스트를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, serializes the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object into the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 지정 된 직렬화 <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> 개체는 <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object to serialize.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> serialize 할 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> to write to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>에 쓰려고 합니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> 현재 serialization 컨텍스트를 포함 하는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes a child element inside the RSTR.
trans-unit.target: 파생된 클래스에서 재정의 되 면 RSTR 내 자식 요소를 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object to which the RSTR is being serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>RSTR serialize 되 고 있는 개체입니다.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the element to be written.
trans-unit.target: 기록할 요소의 로컬 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the element.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"></xref> object that is being serialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.RequestSecurityTokenResponse"> </xref> 개체는 serialize 되 고입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"></xref> that contains the current serialization context.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext"> </xref> 현재 serialization 컨텍스트를 포함 하는 합니다.
